class Problem¶
#include <Problem.h>

The base class for the optimization problem.

This class is the base class for the optimization problem. It contains the basic structure for the optimization problem.

Subclassed by PaperTestProblem, Triangle

  • utilities_rdm – DU multipliers associated with the utilities.

  • policies_rdm – Policies multipliers associated with the policies.

Protected Functions

double checkAndFixInfraExpansionHighLowOrder(vector<int> *order, vector<double> *trigger, int id_low, int id_high, double capacity_low, double capacity_high)¶

Checks if the order of infrastructure expansion is correct and fixes it if necessary.

Parameters:

  • order – The order of infrastructure expansion.

  • triggers – The triggers for infrastructure expansion.

  • id_low – The ID of the low order infrastructure.

  • id_high – The ID of the high order infrastructure.

  • capacity_low – The capacity of the low order infrastructure.

  • capacity_high – The capacity of the high order infrastructure.

Returns:

double The capacity of the high order infrastructure.
